## Newer Intro

### Bright and Crisp

{{< video https://www.youtube.com/embed/2XuXC3_pLGg >}}

- The initial hit is like a [Tennis Volley in an echoey room](https://www.youtube.com/shorts/L2Rcu_7ZzNc)
- Drone reminds of [2001 Space Odyssey](https://youtu.be/QwxYiVXYyVs)

## Past intros

The older ones are noticably longer.

- [Paper rubbing together](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3N8XJQMRhMQ&pp=ygUNcGFwZXIgcnViYmluZw%3D%3D)
